resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
Hello, its Eylon Mazor and Tal Museri :)

We developed thi
s application as a final project as part of a B.S.c degree in Computer Science at Hadassah Academic College Jerusalem.
The app is designed to serve all IDF soldiers - in order to save them a long and exhausting process.

We were both fighters in the army (Golani and Palsar 401) so we both know well the process of calibrate weapons, and from that - we decided to try to develop an app that will streamline the process for everyone around - both in terms of time and money.
Hope you use and get help with this app!
Do you want start a new project? or load exist one?
